entry.description: Add Logback throwable-consuming semantics as an option in `log4j-slf4j-impl` and `log4j-slf4j2-impl`. Users can enable it by setting the property xref:manual/systemproperties.adoc#log4j2.messageFactory[`log4j2.messageFactory`] to `org.apache.logging.slf4j.message.ThrowableConsumingMessageFactory`.
